welcome.title: What is goin on with this

content.1: THIS IS A COLLECTION OF DIFFERENT APIS, SOMETIMES FUNNY, SOMETIMES A LITTLE MORE USEFUL
content.3: AND SEE WHAT'S WAITING FOR YOU :D!

memes.author: Author
memes.content: This section is responsible for downloading random memes from different categories. The source of the funny pictures are the respective reddit groups. To upload a new image, press one of the highlighted categories. Remember that memes are completely random, so they don't all have to be funny, and some may be controversial.

yoda.desc: In this section, you can replace any text with one spoken by Master Yoda and feel like in the legendary Star Wars. For the translation to work, you must enter the text in English.
yoda.instruction: Type in what Master Yoda has to say!
yoda.error: The length of the text cannot exceed 250 characters!
yoda.quote: Patience you must have, my young Padawan.

cookies-policy.title: Dear User,
cookies-policy.message: Before you click any button, please read this information to the end, it concerns your personal data. By clicking Go to the website you consent to the processing of your personal data regarding your activity on the Internet (e.g. device identifiers, IP address) by us - i.e. Ringier Axel Springer Polska sp. z o.o. (RASP), IAB Trusted Partners and other Trusted Partners for marketing purposes (including automatic ad personalization and measurement), in order to customize the content provided, ensure the proper functioning of social networking site functionalities and for other purposes listed below, as well as consent to sharing PPID by us to Google. A detailed description of the purposes and scope of the processed data can be found here - they include (classification according to IAB Europe), among others: selection of basic advertisements; creating a profile of personalized advertisements; selection of personalized advertisements; creating a personalized content profile; selection of personalized content; advertising performance measurement; content performance measurement; using market research to generate audience feedback; product development and improvement, and special features such as: use of accurate geolocation data and active scanning of device characteristics for identification purposes. Consent is voluntary. You can refuse it or limit its scope by clicking on „Reject”.
